mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_CART(MCNUM, KMNUM, MNUM, MID, MCNT, MNAME, MPRICE , MPRICESUM, MDES, MCOM, MIMG ,MINSERTDATE,MUPDATEDATE, MDELETEYN) VALUES ( #{mcnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpricesum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,SYSDATE,SYSDATE, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT*FROM( SELECT A.MCNUM AS MCNUM ,A.KMNUM AS KMNUM ,A.MNUM AS MNUM ,A.MID AS MID ,A.MCNT AS MCNT ,A.MNAME AS MNAME ,A.MPRICE AS MPRICE ,A.MPRICESUM AS MPRICESUM ,A.MDES AS MDES ,A.MCOM AS MCOM ,A.MIMG AS MIMG , A.MDELETEYN AS MDELETEYN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MINSERTDATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MUPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MUPDATEDATE ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.KMNUM)/ #{pageSize} ) AS pageSize ,COUNT( A.MCNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM KOSMO_CART A WHERE A.MDELETEYN='Y' ) WHERE PAGESIZE=#{curPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE KOSMO_CART SET MUPDATEDATE=SYSDATE, MDELETEYN='N' WHERE KMNUM=#{kmnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MDELETEYN='Y'
